name: Simran Jain

text: Nivesh worked with me at the very beginning of his career and even at that early stage he showed incredible maturity in the work he did. He could see the bigger picture, beyond what he was tasked with and as a result he brought valuable ideas to the table. He's a quick study and onboarded onto any new project with ease. I have seen him raise the bar for himself repeatedly. He was a treasured teammate and I had a great time working with him!

text: I had the pleasure of working with Nivesh, and they’re one of those fun people who combine deep technical strength with a genuinely fun and positive attitude.
